response.overview: These are the final hours in the place where he was born and raised, where he gained the wings he will now use to embark on a new life.  Among the last dances and toasts with friends, there's someone who stands out: Guilherme.  The secret connection between them and everything that was never said or acknowledged will be the ties that must be untangled so that the farewell they don't want to say can become possible.
response.tagline: It's a festive day in Trás-os-Montes, Portugal: Duarte is celebrating with his friends on the last day before his flight to England.
response.title: Adeus
